Drama, starring Anna Friel, Brenda Fricker, Molly Parker, Loren Dean and Aden Young.

programme.title: Out of the Woods
programme.desc: A lawyer is persuaded by his mother to take a trip to a rural backwater to check up on his elderly grandfather, and is horrified by the old man's eccentric behaviour and rejection of modern life. As he tries to cope with the culture shock, he receives an eye-opening lesson in life and love along the way. Drama, starring Jason London, Edward Asner, Missy Crider and Meredith Salenger.

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Orphan Hobart Shank comes to stay and John-Boy tries to get him a contract as a professional baseball player - but tragedy strikes when he breaks his arm in a fall, destroying his one chance at fame.

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part one of two. A widow realises she does not have long to live, so asks Charles to find homes for her three children.

programme.title: Daughter of the Bride
programme.desc: A wedding planner is horrified when her mother announces she intends to marry a man she has only known for a short time. Convinced this is a dreadful mistake, the desperate daughter makes every effort to put a stop to the ceremony, until an unexpected development forces her to reassess her feelings. Romantic drama, starring Joanna Garcia, Luke Perry, Helen Shaver, James D Hopkin and Chantal Perron.

programme.title: Blessed Stranger: After Flight 111
programme.desc: A woman whose teenage daughter was lost in a plane crash in Nova Scotia hopes to find evidence that she somehow survived. A fisherman who was involved in the rescue effort retrieved the missing girl's sweater from the wreckage, and the desperate mother visits him in the hope that he can help find her. Drama, with Kate Nelligan, Hugh Thompson, Stacy Smith and Janet Kidder.

programme.title: Run for Your Life
programme.desc: A woman and her two daughters are stalked by her abusive ex-husband, and she finds the law is unable to protect her from him. She begins to feel that her children's safety can only be guaranteed by the family going into hiding or resorting to murder. Fact-based thriller, starring Amy Smart and Mark Humphrey.

programme.title: Killer Instinct: From the Files of Candice DeLong
programme.desc: An FBI agent retires after 15 gruelling years to pursue a career in nursing. She is drawn back to the bureau after her best friend is raped by a man responsible for a series of murders. However, as she investigates the case, she and her son end up being stalked by the killer. Fact-based crime drama, starring Jean Smart and A Martinez.

programme.title: Another Life
programme.desc: Fact-based period drama loosely based on the well-publicised murder of Percy Thompson during the 1920s. Starring Natasha Little, Nick Moran, Ioan Gruffudd and Imelda Staunton.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: The Baldwin sisters' niece returns to America after living in Germany, and John Boy suspects she is running away from something terrible that happened there.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: John-Boy needs some peace and quiet to finish writing his book. Ben quits his job at the newspaper and becomes a car salesman, but picks up some dishonest habits.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Mrs Oleson's prejudice and hatred makes a former circus dwarf's life a misery when he moves to Walnut Groove. Billy Barty guest stars.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part one of two. A traveling side show, run by Dr Joshua McQueen, features the `Wild Boy of the North' as its main attraction. Roughly nine years old, the child escapes and ultimately seeks shelter with the Wilders. With the help of Doc Baker, they find some unsettling truths about him.(n)

programme.title: Marco Polo
programme.desc: Conclusion of the two-part drama retelling the life of the 13th-century Venetian trader and his epic journey to the Far East, escorting two priests travelling to the unknown land of China with the aim of converting the population to Christianity. Starring Ian Somerhalder, Brian Dennehy, Desiree Siahaan and BD Wong.(n)

programme.title: Borrowed Hearts
programme.desc: A ruthless factory boss pays a hard-up employee to pose as his wife, hoping to impress a mysterious colleague - an arrangement with unexpected consequences for all concerned. Romantic drama, starring Roma Downey, Eric McCormack and Shawn Thompson.(n)

programme.title: Holiday Engagement
programme.desc: A woman who has lived her life under constant pressure from her mother to find a man gets engaged, only for her fiance to leave her just before she is due to head home for Thanksgiving. Rather than face parental disapproval, she hires an actor to pose as her future husband. Comedy, with Bonnie Somerville, Shelley Long and Haylie Duff.(n)

programme.title: The Engagement Ring
programme.desc: When a missing engagement ring turns up 40 years after it was lost, its appearance opens old wounds but also prompts a new romance to blossom. Romantic comedy, starring Patricia Heaton, Vincent Spano, Tony Lo Bianco and David Hunt.(n)

programme.title: The Waltons
programme.desc: Erin finds an orphaned fawn and decides to nurse it back to health, while John-Boy's new job as a rent collector makes him extremely unpopular with the locals. Charles Tyner guest stars, with Richard Thomas.(n)

programme.title: Little House on the Prairie
programme.desc: Part two of two. Charles has a difficult time trying to find someone who will adopt all three Sanderson children. It looks as if the children will get split up, and while they try to be brave, Alicia breaks down at the thought of leaving her brothers and Grace Snider. At the very last moment, Mr Edwards makes a monumental decision.(n)

programme.title: Too Young to Marry
programme.desc: When high school students Jessica and Max announce they plan to marry, their decision is met with objections from friends and family who feel they're rushing into things. The couple remain determined to carve out a successful life for themselves, but when Jessica is accepted at Harvard University, she faces a dilemma. Romantic drama, starring Nina Dobrev and Dillon Casey.(n)

programme.title: See Jane Date
programme.desc: A publishing assistant endures a series of romantic misadventures as she tries to find the ideal date to escort her to a family wedding - and impress the former high-school rival who stole her boyfriend. Romantic comedy, starring Charisma Carpenter, Holly Marie Combs, Antonio Sabato Jr and Linda Dano.(n)

programme.title: The Pastor's Wife
programme.desc: True story based on Mary Winkler, who stunned a nation by murdering her preacher husband. But was everything in their life as serene as it appeared? Starring Rose McGowan.(n)

programme.title: The Hazing Secret
programme.desc: A woman loses her long-term memory in an accident, and every night she has the same dream of a party and the death of a sister. However, when she is invited to a Greek reunion, she realises it wasn't just a dream. Mystery thriller, starring Shenae Grimes-Beech, Keegan Allen and Amanda Thomson.(n)

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Black
programme.desc: Marlon Wayans stars as Christian Black in a comedy about a millionaire control freak who introduces shy college student Hannah Steele (Kali Hawk) to the world of "romance" after she interviews him for the school newspaper

programme.title: Don Jon
programme.desc: A dissatisfied lothario embarks on a journey to find a more gratifying sex life, but ends up learning larger lessons of life and love through relationships with two very different women

programme.title: A Flash of Light
programme.desc: Carrie handles her client. Saul's trip takes a turn. Quinn investigates(c)

programme.title: The Bank Job
programme.desc: A notorious 1971 bank robbery in London is the basis for this exciting, suspenseful thriller starring Jason Statham as a car dealer who agrees to the dangerous heist in order to finance a new family but gets more than he bargains for when the break-in yields not just riches but a slew of valuable state secrets. Saffron Burrows costars in this exciting crime thriller from director Roger Donaldson

programme.title: Sunshine
programme.desc: Ralph Fiennes ("Schindler's List," "Quiz Show") stars in this sprawling epic as three different men in successive generations of a Hungarian Jewish family struggling through the political and social upheaval of World War II, the rise of communism, and the Hungarian Revolution. Rachel Weisz, James Frain, Jennifer Ehle, Molly Parker, William Hurt and Rosemary Harris costar

programme.title: Diary of a Mad Black Woman
programme.desc: Tyler Perry wrote and costars in this box office smash about a divorcee (Kimberly Elise) who learns to trust and love again after a nasty break up with her arrogant and emotionally distant attorney husband, thanks to comically sage advice from her sassy grandmother Madea. Shemar Moore and Cicely Tyson costar

programme.title: Star Trek II: The Wrath of Khan
programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk escapes the tedium of his desk job to embark on another space mission and crosses path with his old enemy, Khan, who is on a mission to destroy the Enterprise, even if it means universal Armageddon. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: Chicago
programme.desc: At a time when crimes of passion result in celebrity headlines, nightclub sensation Velma Kelly (Catherine Zeta-Jones) and spotlight seeking Roxie Hart (Renee Zellweger) both find themselves sharing space on Chicago's famed Murderess Row. They also share Billy Flynn (Richard Gere), the town's slickest lawyer with a talent for turning notorious defendants into local legends. Winner of 6 Academy Awards®

programme.title: The Eye
programme.desc: Jessica Alba stars in this terrifying remake of a Japanese horror classic about a blind concert violinist whose double corneal transplant gives her the gift of sight, but also the curse of seeing horrifying future events. Alessandro Nivola, Parker Posey and Rade Serbedzija costar

programme.title: Blue Crush
programme.desc: An adrenaline fueled surf film starring Kate Bosworth as a former surfing great still reeling from a horrifying injury but at the prodding of her friends, she signs up for a pro surfing competition that could change her life

programme.title: The Preppie Connection
programme.desc: Thomas Mann stars as a working class prodigy who enters the elite corridors of a prep school in his home town and vies for acceptance into the world of privilege, while trying to charm the beautiful and elusive girl of his dreams, but finds that the way in with the preppy crowd comes at a steep cost

programme.title: Dead Heat
programme.desc: Well-meaning retired cop Pally (Kiefer Sutherland) is only trying to help out his stepbrother Ray (Anthony LaPaglia) when he agrees to bankroll a long-shot racehorse. But a big-time Mob figure (Daniel Benzali) also has an interest in the animal and before you can say "conflict of interest," Pally and Ray are mired in business with some very shady figures. Lothaire Bluteau and Radha Mitchell costar in this superb crime drama from writer/director Mark Malone ("Dead of Winter," "Hoods")

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms

programme.title: No Country for Old Men
programme.desc: When a man stumbles upon a bloody crime scene, a pickup truck loaded with heroin and two million dollars in cash, his decision to take the money and run ignites an unstoppable chain reaction of violence and mayhem in writer/director Joel and Ethan Coen's Academy Award winning thriller. Starring Tommy Lee Jones, Javier Bardem and Josh Brolin

programme.title: The Hurt Locker
programme.desc: The Academy Awards® for Best Picture, Best Director and Best Original Screenplay went to this gritty war drama about a psychologically unglued bomb removal expert plying his trade in Iraq while his crew becomes increasingly unnerved by his cowboy recklessness. Jeremy Renner, Anthony Mackie and Brian Geraghty star in this acclaimed, tension-filled journey into the heart of darkness

programme.title: Cabin Fever
programme.desc: In this classic horror, a group of college friends retreat to a remote cabin in the woods for one last week of partying, only to find themselves snacks for a gruesome flesh-eating virus

programme.title: Madonna: Rebel Heart Tour
programme.desc: Concert special featuring the iconic superstar as she performs in packed arenas around the globe. Featuring new hits and beloved classics that showcase Madonna's signature visual theatrics, exquisite costumes and awe-inspiring choreography. With exclusive behind-the-scenes access that reveal the pop icon and her legion of dancers as they pour blood, sweat and tears into creating an astonishing arena show celebrated by fans around the world

programme.title: Public Enemy: Live from Metropolis Studios
programme.desc: Documentary featuring a special performance by one of the most influential hip hop acts of all time at the world famous Metropolis Sound Studio in London. Twenty-five years after the release of Public Enemy's most successful album Fear of a Black Planet, the rap legends Chuck D, Flavor Flav, DJ Lord and The S1W perform all of their fan favorites, interspersed with frank interview footage

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms

programme.title: Sebastian Maniscalco: Why Would You Do That?
programme.desc: The outrageously funny stand up Sebastian Maniscalco stars in this comedy special, blending his high energy physicality and his inimitable facial expressions to send up modern life through the lens of his old-world, Italian-American upbringing

programme.title: The Royal Tenenbaums
programme.desc: Directed by Wes Anderson, this offbeat comedy is the story of an extraordinary family's sudden and unexpected reunion, as the three former genius children and their inimitable mother and father try to reconcile after decades of betrayal, failure and disaster. Features an all-star cast, including Gene Hackman, Anjelica Huston, Ben Stiller, Gwyneth Paltrow and Luke Wilson

programme.title: Star Trek III: The Search for Spock
programme.desc: In this classic movie spin off from the TV series, Admiral Kirk and his crew risk their careers when they steal the decommissioned Enterprise to return to the restricted Genesis planet to recover Captain Spock's body. Stars William Shatner and Leonard Nimoy

programme.title: Paranoia
programme.desc: When a rising star in the global tech company makes an innocent mistake, he must become a corporate spy to obtain trade secrets from a rival company. But what starts as a clever ruse becomes a life-and-death game of corporate espionage. Stars Liam Hemsworth, Harrison Ford and Gary Oldman

programme.title: Spy Game
programme.desc: Academy Award®-winner Robert Redford stars as a CIA maverick who is on the brink of retirement from the field when he learns that his protégé (Brad Pitt) has been arrested in China on a charge of espionage and he must find a way to free him

programme.title: What Women Want
programme.desc: Electrocuted in a hairdryer mishap, womanizing ad exec Nick Marshall (Mel Gibson) is suddenly able to hear the thoughts of the opposite sex. At first, Nick thinks he's been given a terrific advantage in the bedroom and the boardroom, but soon his psychic gift turns the once-clueless Nick into a better father, employee and man, a transformation that does not go unnoticed by his beautiful boss Darcy (Helen Hunt). Alan Alda, Marisa Tomei, Lauren Holly, Ashley Johnson and Mark Feuerstein costar in this comedy blockbuster

programme.title: Burnt
programme.desc: Bradley Cooper stars as a former top chef whose drug and alcohol habit led to a career meltdown but he gets a shot at redemption when his former maître d' hires him as the head of his fine-dining restaurant in London. Stars Sienna Miller and Daniel Brühl

programme.title: Triple 9
programme.desc: An ex-special forces member leads a crew of corrupt police officers and former soldiers in a daring bank robbery in this classic heist thriller. Stars Chiwetel Ejiofor, Kate Winslet, Woody Harrelson and Casey Affleck(n)

programme.title: A Flash of Light
programme.desc: Carrie handles her client. Saul's trip takes a turn. Quinn investigates(n)
Nic, Vin, and Steven are enlisted to babysit, while Brace takes a personal day; Jimmy anticipates coming clean about his profession when two old friends from college visit(n)

credits.director: Graphic Language, Nudity, Strong Sexual Content

programme.title: Upgrade
programme.desc: Technology is evolving from an external tool we wield when needed to an always-there presence that is with us, on us, even inside of us. As we become more and more wired, are we becoming digital devices ourselves? In this episode meet a Swedish mom who implanted an RFID chip as a lifestyle choice; a filmmaker who lost his eye in a gun accident and replaced it with a camera; and the so-called "world most connected man," who uses between 300-700 tracking and life logging systems to monitor every aspect of his life(n)

credits.writer: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Nudity, Strong Sexual Content

programme.title: A Flash of Light
programme.desc: Carrie handles her client. Saul's trip takes a turn. Quinn investigates(n)

programme.title: Jermaine Fowler: Give'em Hell Kid
programme.desc: Comedian Jermaine Fowler performs his first ever stand-up special, dissecting his life in hilarious detail from his childhood to dealing with Internet trolls and his "special" brother(n)

programme.title: Cape Fear
programme.desc: Robert De Niro stars as a vicious psychopath and ex-convict who devotes his life to stalking and destroying the family of the man who put him in jail. Directed by Martin Scorcese. Also stars Nick Nolte, Jessica Lange and Juliette Lewis(n)

programme.title: Open Water
programme.desc: Loosely inspired by a shocking true story, this chilling psychological horror story follows a bickering couple on vacation in the Caribbean who are accidentally abandoned during a diving expedition and forced to fend for themselves in the ocean as they are surrounded by sharks - while the tour operators back at the harbor take 24 hours to realize that they have left a pair of customers stranded. Blanchard Ryan and Daniel Travis star in this gripping independent hit from writer/director Chris Kentis(n)

programme.title: Burnt
programme.desc: Bradley Cooper stars as a former top chef whose drug and alcohol habit led to a career meltdown but he gets a shot at redemption when his former maître d' hires him as the head of his fine-dining restaurant in London. Stars Sienna Miller and Daniel Brühl(n)

programme.title: The Hurricane
programme.desc: Based on a true story, Denzel Washington stars as Rubin "Hurricane" Carter -- a man whose dreams of winning the middleweight boxing title are destroyed when he is wrongly accused of killing three people in a New Jersey bar. Years later, in jail, a young man begins an impassioned and moving fight to prove Hurricane's innocence. Also stars Liev Schreiber(n)

programme.title: Weiner
programme.desc: Documentary featuring a jaw-dropping, behind-the-scenes look at the attempted comeback of Anthony Weiner in 2013 as he mounts a campaign for New York City mayor in the wake of his sexting scandal. But it's not long before history repeats itself and new sexting allegations leave Weiner and his aides scrambling to contain the damage. Featuring unfettered access to the candidate and his campaign. Winner of the 2016 Sundance Grand Jury Prize for U.S. Documentary(n)

programme.title: Everything Must Go
programme.desc: Will Ferrell stars as a career salesman who loses his wife and his job on the worst day of his life and must put everything on the line - or the lawn - as he moves his possessions into his front yard in this comedy about what happens after things falls apart. Also stars Rebecca Hall. Based on the short story by Raymond Carver(n)

programme.title: Fast Times at Ridgemont High
programme.desc: In this classic comedy based on Cameron Crowe's undercover expose on life in a Southern California high school, a group of students wrestle with love, sex, drugs and making their way into the world. Stars Sean Penn, Jennifer Jason Leigh and Phoebe Cates(n)

programme.title: Gangs of New York
programme.desc: As waves of immigrants swell the population, corruption thrives in lower Manhattan's Five Points section. Leonardo DiCaprio stars as Amsterdam Vallon, an Irish immigrant who returns to New York seeking revenge against Bill "The Butcher" (Oscar®-winner Daniel Day-Lewis), a rival gang leader who killed his father. But Amsterdam's personal vendetta becomes part of the gang warfare in director Martin Scorsese's sweeping historical epic(n)

programme.title: Crash
programme.desc: From writer/director Paul Haggis ("Million Dollar Baby") comes this Best Picture Oscar-winning drama that follows the intersecting lives of several Los Angeles natives whose attitudes toward race are challenged by a series of fateful events. Chris "Ludacris" Bridges, Sandra Bullock, Don Cheadle, Matt Dillon, Brendan Fraser, Terrence Howard, Thandie Newton and Ryan Phillippe star in this controversial, critically acclaimed film(n)

programme.title: It Follows
programme.desc: After a seemingly innocent sexual encounter, a 19-year-old girl finds herself plagued by nightmarish visions and can't shake the sensation that someone or something is following her. As the threat closes in, she and her friends must escape the horrors that are only a few steps behind

programme.title: Girl House
programme.desc: In an attempt to make some extra cash while away at college, a woman moves into a house that streams content to an X-rated website. After a deranged fan hacks the house's location, she finds herself in a terrifying fight for her life

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: A surprise box office smash, this grisly horror tale terrified audiences with its story of two men (Cary Elwes and Leigh Whannell) who awaken imprisoned in the lair of a serial killer nicknamed Jigsaw, who plays vicious mind-games with his victims until he can manipulate them into killing each other. Meanwhile, a pair of desperate detectives (Danny Glover and Ken Leung) try to find the kidnapper before he can carve up his next pair of victims

programme.title: Cabin Fever
programme.desc: In this classic horror, a group of college friends retreat to a remote cabin in the woods for one last week of partying, only to find themselves snacks for a gruesome flesh-eating virus

programme.title: It Follows
programme.desc: After a seemingly innocent sexual encounter, a 19-year-old girl finds herself plagued by nightmarish visions and can't shake the sensation that someone or something is following her. As the threat closes in, she and her friends must escape the horrors that are only a few steps behind

programme.title: The Lovers
programme.desc: After a dangerous dive into the wreckage of a British merchant ship to save his wife, a marine biologist falls into a coma that transports us back in time to India in 1788, where a young British captain falls for an Indian woman, in this tale of two centuries, two continents and star-crossed lovers linked together by a powerful ring. Stars Josh Hartnett

programme.title: The Roost
programme.desc: Four friends en route to a wedding on Halloween night suffer an automotive mishap that lands them squarely in the lair of zombie-creating vampire bats, while a creepy "horror host" (Tom Noonan) occasionally interrupts the action to comment on this exquisite slice of B-movie hokum. Real-life siblings Wil and Vanessa Horneff costar with Karl Jacob, Sean Reid and genre guru Larry Fessenden, who turns in a cameo

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: When a diamond expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team of scientists is assembled to find out what went wrong and on the journey, they must wrestle with the wild dangers of a primeval landscape. Stars Laura Linney, Dylan Walsh and Tim Curry

programme.title: The Hunters
programme.desc: After the disappearance of two famous treasure hunters who protect the objects from ancient fairy tales from an evil force, it's up to their two sons to find Snow White's mirror before it falls into the wrong hands

programme.title: The Wicked Within
programme.desc: After the death of a child, a vengeful spirit takes possession of a woman, who forces each family member to confess to their buried lies or face the morbid consequences of their sins

programme.title: Santa Claws
programme.desc: In this animated family movie, after Santa has an allergic reaction to cats, a litter of rascally kittens must fill in for him, in a race against the clock to deliver all the presents on time

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people

programme.title: Congo
programme.desc: When a diamond expedition to the African Congo ends in disaster, a new team of scientists is assembled to find out what went wrong and on the journey, they must wrestle with the wild dangers of a primeval landscape. Stars Laura Linney, Dylan Walsh and Tim Curry

programme.desc: After the death of a child, a vengeful spirit takes possession of a woman, who forces each family member to confess to their buried lies or face the morbid consequences of their sins

programme.title: Hannibal Rising
programme.desc: Author Thomas Harris teams with director Peter Webber to present this horrifying, gripping prequel that reveals the origins of future serial killer Hannibal Lecter (Gaspard Ulliel), a frightened Lithuanian refugee from World War II who uses his razor-sharp mind to acquire the skills that will enable him to get grisly revenge on the soldiers that murdered his family. Gong Li costars in this dark, surprising chapter in the Lecter mythos

programme.title: I Survived a Zombie Holocaust
programme.desc: Fresh from film school, an enthusiastic young runner starts work on a low budget zombie movie only to run into the first day from hell as a mystery illness starts to turn the extras on set into the bona fide undead

programme.title: Anarchy Parlor
programme.desc: Horror about a mysterious nomad who works at a Lithuanian tattoo parlor where he practices a dark art form passed down through the generations, giving the visiting tourists much more than they bargained for

programme.title: The Wicked Within
programme.desc: After the death of a child, a vengeful spirit takes possession of a woman, who forces each family member to confess to their buried lies or face the morbid consequences of their sins

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people

programme.title: Whiskers
programme.desc: Eleven-year-old Jed (Michael Caloz) arranges for the Egyptian goddess of felines to turn his cuddly cat into a kid. However, since cat years and human years figure differently, "Whiskers" is now a thirty-year-old man. Jacob Tierney costars in this cat comedy

programme.title: Murder in the Dark
programme.desc: While camping in the ruins of an ancient Turkish town, an innocent game turns deadly for a group of friends

programme.title: When Time Expires
programme.desc: If futuristic time traveler Richard Grieco fails to place a quarter in a parking meter at precisely the right moment, a series of chain reactions will ultimately result in the destruction of Earth in this sci-fi action thriller costarring Chad Everett and Mark Hamill

programme.title: Capsule
programme.desc: In 1959, during the height of the Cold War, an experienced fighter pilot finds himself trapped in a malfunctioning spacecraft and must fight to survive in order to make it home to Earth

programme.title: Down To Earth
programme.desc: Chris Rock is struggling comedian Lance Burton, who is taken long before his time by an anxious angel and finds temporary refuge back on Earth in the body of a prejudiced, white millionaire. Soon Lance ("Charles" to those who only know him by his new identity) is wooing a community rights activist (Regina King) and dodging a bullet as his wife and her lover try to kill him

programme.title: The Hills Have Eyes
programme.desc: Directed by Wes Craven, this cult horror classic is the tale of an all-American family on a road trip to California when their car breaks down in the remote southwestern desert, and they encounter a clan of marauding, inbred cannibals. In this primal wasteland, will the innocent turn savage to survive?

programme.title: Awaken
programme.desc: A dark thriller about a group of young adults who wake up on a deserted tropical island to find they are being hunted down in a sinister plot to harvest their organs. Stars Edward Furlong and Daryl Hannah

programme.title: The Roost

Real-life siblings Wil and Vanessa Horneff costar with Karl Jacob, Sean Reid and genre guru Larry Fessenden, who turns in a cameo(n)

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: When a young woman moves into a large Victorian home to become the caretaker to her aging, sickly grandmother, she soon finds herself sleepwalking and having strange visions and is forced to confront her family's darkest secrets before the evil presence in the house overtakes her sanity(n)

programme.title: The Culling
programme.desc: Supernatural thriller in which a group of college friends on a road trip find themselves fighting off dark forces at a remote farmhouse, after a chance encounter with a strange little girl(n)

programme.title: Backcountry
programme.desc: A thriller based on a true story about a big city couple who go camping along a secluded Canadian trail and find themselves lost and at the mercy of the wild(n)

programme.title: The Wicked Within
programme.desc: After the death of a child, a vengeful spirit takes possession of a woman, who forces each family member to confess to their buried lies or face the morbid consequences of their sins(n)

programme.title: Medium Raw
programme.desc: Detective Johnny Morgan finally tracks down the deranged serial killer that kidnapped and murdered his sister 20 years earlier but is disappointed when the fiend receives life imprisonment in an insane asylum instead of the death penalty. Visiting the prisoner intending to exact revenge, Johnny is instead trapped inside the institution when a power outage frees the inmates and seals off all escape routes. Andrew Cymek, John Rhys-Davies and William B. Davis star in this horror thriller(n)

programme.title: The Culling
programme.desc: Supernatural thriller in which a group of college friends on a road trip find themselves fighting off dark forces at a remote farmhouse, after a chance encounter with a strange little girl(n)

programme.title: Backcountry
programme.desc: A thriller based on a true story about a big city couple who go camping along a secluded Canadian trail and find themselves lost and at the mercy of the wild(n)

programme.title: Sleeping with Other People
programme.desc: Twelve years after a one-night stand in college, two New Yorkers (Alison Brie and Jason Sudeikis) meet by chance and discover they each have the same problem: because of their monogamy-challenged ways, neither can maintain a relationship. Determined to stay friends despite their mutual attraction, they make a pact to keep it platonic, a deal that proves easier said than done. Amanda Peet, Adam Scott and Natasha Lyonne co-star

programme.title: The Duff
programme.desc: After finding out that her classmates have been calling her "the Duff" (Designated Ugly Fat Friend) behind her back, a high school senior decides to reinvent herself with the help of a charming jock and in the process overthrow the school's social order

programme.title: National Lampoon Presents Cattle Call
programme.desc: A group of actresses plot revenge after learning that a high profile casting call was just a scam cooked up by three lonely losers looking to get laid. Stars Chelsea Handler and Thomas Ian Nicholas

programme.title: Speak
programme.desc: Kristen Stewart is a teenager traumatized into silence after a summer party ends in a police raid that leaves her ostracized by her friends but unable to explain her actions. Elizabeth Perkins, D.B. Sweeney and Steve Zahn costar in this drama based on the award-winning novel by Laurie Halse Anderson

programme.title: Southpaw
programme.desc: Jake Gyllenhaal stars as a reigning junior middleweight boxing champion, with an impressive career, a loving wife and daughter and a lavish lifestyle. But when tragedy strikes, he hits rock bottom and finds an unlikely savior in a former fighter who trains the city's toughest amateur boxers. With his future on the line, the former champ must fight to reclaim the trust of those he loves the most. Co-stars Rachel McAdams and Forest Whitaker

programme.title: The One I Wrote For You
programme.desc: A singer/songwriter (Cheyenne Jackson) who walked away from a chance at stardom a decade ago enters a reality TV show contest and finds himself once again drawn into the intoxicating world of fame and fortune. As a semi-finalist, he transforms into an audience favorite - but in his rise to the top, will he forget what matters most?

programme.title: Pete Correale: Let Me Tell Ya
programme.desc: Stand up comedian Pete Correale explores the absurdities of life, love and marriage in his hilarious comedy special where he gives his homegrown New Yorker take on everything from the joy of ice cream to the pain of political correctness

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship

programme.title: Hoop Dreams
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the story of two ordinary inner-city kids who chase the dream of professional basketball glory. Filmed over a five-year period, the two young boys navigate the complex, competitive world of scholastic athletics while striving to overcome the intense pressures of family life and the realities of their Chicago streets

programme.title: Big Significant Things
programme.desc: A week before he's set to move across the country with his girlfriend, a young man impulsively sets out on a solo road trip across the US to see the nation's largest objects in this comedy of self-discovery

programme.title: Tenderness
programme.desc: A confused fifteen-year-old dreamer in search of an escape from her troubled home life becomes enthralled with a young man with a violent past and embarks on a dangerous road trip. Stars Russell Crowe and Sophie Traub

programme.title: Angels of Darkness
programme.desc: Psychological thriller about a woman and her estranged father who go behind the Iron Curtain to a small Hungarian town where strange events unfold. From withering crops to dying farm animals and the local young women going mad -- they must find out if there's a darker secret behind the mass hysteria destroying the town. Stars Stephen Rea

programme.title: Wrong Side of Town
programme.desc: A former Navy SEAL seeks revenge after a nightclub owner attacks his wife but when a bounty is placed on his head in retaliation, he must escape LA while being pursued by every criminal, wise guy and thug in town

programme.title: Street Dance Family
programme.desc: Documentary following Entity - one of UK's most successful and controversial under sixteen street dance crew - who battle to overcome the challenges that face them in their bid for glory on the world stage. Features fly-on-the-wall footage from the training room to international competitions and examines the lives of the trainers, the kids and their families as they compete for the World Championship

programme.title: Hoop Dreams

Filmed over a five-year period, the two young boys navigate the complex, competitive world of scholastic athletics while striving to overcome the intense pressures of family life and the realities of their Chicago streets

programme.title: Lenny Cooke
programme.desc: In an era when high school stars were forgoing college hoops in favor of the multi-million dollar contracts promised in the NBA draft, Lenny was supposed to be the next superstar. But over a decade later, while his peers are taking home MVP awards and championship trophies, Lenny has never played a minute in the NBA. What went wrong? A quintessentially American story about dreaming big, the fickle nature of sports celebrity and the unfulfilled destiny of a man for whom superstardom was only just out of reach

programme.title: Saw
programme.desc: A surprise box office smash, this grisly horror tale terrified audiences with its story of two men (Cary Elwes and Leigh Whannell) who awaken imprisoned in the lair of a serial killer nicknamed Jigsaw, who plays vicious mind-games with his victims until he can manipulate them into killing each other. Meanwhile, a pair of desperate detectives (Danny Glover and Ken Leung) try to find the kidnapper before he can carve up his next pair of victims

programme.title: Tenderness
programme.desc: A confused fifteen-year-old dreamer in search of an escape from her troubled home life becomes enthralled with a young man with a violent past and embarks on a dangerous road trip. Stars Russell Crowe and Sophie Traub

programme.title: Hoop Dreams
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling the story of two ordinary inner-city kids who chase the dream of professional basketball glory. Filmed over a five-year period, the two young boys navigate the complex, competitive world of scholastic athletics while striving to overcome the intense pressures of family life and the realities of their Chicago streets

programme.title: The Howling Reborn
programme.desc: Will (Landon Liboiron) is a young man harboring a secret crush on pretty classmate Eliana (Lindsey Shaw) and even bigger secret about his past: he's the son of a werewolf and may have supernatural gifts of his own. When a mysterious attack reveals that a werewolf army is being assembled by someone from his past, he's torn between his true nature and his love for Eliana. This reboot of the "Howling" horror franchise costars Ivana Milicevic

programme.title: Daydream Nation
programme.desc: Bored by her new town and classmates, the new girl (Kat Dennings) seduces a handsome teacher, flirts with a stoner, and avoids a local serial killer targeting teenagers. Josh Lucas and Reece Thompson costar in this offbeat dark comedy

programme.title: Ronnie & Julie
programme.desc: Teenagers who meet thanks to a mutual interest in ice-skating (he's a hockey player, she's a figure skater) proceed to fall head over heels in love, jeopardizing a local election for their rival political families. Joshua Jackson and Margot Finlay star with Teri Garr and Alexandra Purvis in this contemporary reworking of Shakespeare's "Romeo and Juliet."

programme.title: The Caretaker
programme.desc: When a young woman moves into a large Victorian home to become the caretaker to her aging, sickly grandmother, she soon finds herself sleepwalking and having strange visions and is forced to confront her family's darkest secrets before the evil presence in the house overtakes her sanity

programme.title: What If
programme.desc: Comedy starring Daniel Radcliffe as a med school dropout who can't keep his love life in order or keep it separate from a new friendship with a woman who, inconveniently, has a boyfriend. Also stars Zoe Kazan and Adam Driver

programme.title: Arthur & Merlin
programme.desc: Epic fantasy-adventure tale set in Britain's Dark Ages where a banished warrior and a hermit wizard embark on a heroic quest to defeat a powerful druid and save their people

programme.title: Meet the Hitlers
programme.desc: A documentary that examines the relationship between names and identity, by exploring the lives of people who are linked by the name Hitler. This character-driven story offers an intimate portrait of its subjects whose reactions to their name span the spectrum of human experience, from tragedy to comedy, and heartbreak to hope

programme.title: The Howling Reborn
programme.desc: Will (Landon Liboiron) is a young man harboring a secret crush on pretty classmate Eliana (Lindsey Shaw) and even bigger secret about his past: he's the son of a werewolf and may have supernatural gifts of his own. When a mysterious attack reveals that a werewolf army is being assembled by someone from his past, he's torn between his true nature and his love for Eliana. This reboot of the "Howling" horror franchise costars Ivana Milicevic

programme.title: I Survived a Zombie Holocaust
programme.desc: Fresh from film school, an enthusiastic young runner starts work on a low budget zombie movie only to run into the first day from hell as a mystery illness starts to turn the extras on set into the bona fide undead(n)

programme.title: Lumberjack Man
programme.desc: As a church camp group prepares for a devout spring break vacation, a demonic logger rises from his sap boiler to wreak vengeance and feast on flapjacks soaked in the blood of his victims(n)

programme.title: River's Edge
programme.desc: The lives of a group of teenagers are thrown into a moral spin when one of them murders his girlfriend. Faced with the brutal reality of death, each must decide whether to turn their friend in to the police, or to help him escape the consequences of his dreadful deed. Stars Keanu Reeves, Crispin Glover, Ione Skye and Dennis Glover(n)

programme.title: Daydream Nation
programme.desc: Bored by her new town and classmates, the new girl (Kat Dennings) seduces a handsome teacher, flirts with a stoner, and avoids a local serial killer targeting teenagers. Josh Lucas and Reece Thompson costar in this offbeat dark comedy(n)

Joshua Jackson and Margot Finlay star with Teri Garr and Alexandra Purvis in this contemporary reworking of Shakespeare's "Romeo and Juliet."(n)

programme.title: Paper Planes
programme.desc: An imaginative young Australian boy discovers that his talent for folding and flying paper planes could take him to the World Paper Plane Championships to compete against powerful rivals. Stars Sam Worthington(n)

programme.title: Skateboarding's First Wave
programme.desc: Documentary from Academy Award® nominee Don Burgess exploring the origins of skateboarding culture, through the lens of the 1965 Palisades Skateboard Team, who reinvented a childhood hobby into a sport, bringing it to the vanguard of popular culture. Features interviews with the team members reflecting on how the sport has changed, 50 years later(n)

programme.title: A.R.C.H.I.E.
programme.desc: A recently orphaned 15-year-old who has moved to a small town to live with her uncle befriends a robotic canine with super strength, x-ray vision and the ability to talk and the pair take on a military complex, bullies, kidnappers, romance and the world(n)

programme.title: Christmas Ranch
programme.desc: When a rebellious young girl is sent to stay on her grandmother's ranch for Christmas, a friendship with a pony alters the course of her life but when the ranch is threatened with foreclosure she must come up with a plan to save horse and home(n)

programme.title: Jane Wants a Boyfriend
programme.desc: A bright-eyed young woman in her mid-20s living with autism, and enamored of old Hollywood romantic movies, decides she wants a boyfriend and when she meets a charming sous chef, it seems that true romance might be possible(n)

programme.title: Ask Me Anything
programme.desc: A beautiful and lost young woman takes a year off before college to find herself, and chronicles her life in an anonymous blog, but as she becomes embroiled further in a series of sexual and romantic misadventures, her fearless narrative begins to crack(n)

programme.title: Paper Planes
programme.desc: An imaginative young Australian boy discovers that his talent for folding and flying paper planes could take him to the World Paper Plane Championships to compete against powerful rivals. Stars Sam Worthington(n)

programme.title: All Things Must Pass
programme.desc: Documentary chronicling Tower Records explosive trajectory from humble beginnings in a small-town drugstore to a billion dollar music powerhouse, with 200 stores in 30 countries, and then a fall from grace to bankruptcy. Features music icons, including Dave Grohl, Elton John and Bruce Springsteen(n)

programme.title: In My Father's House
programme.desc: Award winning documentary following hip-hop artist Che "Rhymefest" Smith - co-writer of the 2015 Oscar winning song "Glory" from the motion picture 'Selma' and 2005 Grammy winner for the song "Jesus Walks" with Kanye West - as he moves into his childhood home on Chicago's South Side and hesitantly sets out to reconnect with his estranged father, the man who abandoned him over twenty years ago(n)

programme.title: Everything Must Go
programme.desc: Will Ferrell stars as a career salesman who loses his wife and his job on the worst day of his life and must put everything on the line - or the lawn - as he moves his possessions into his front yard in this comedy about what happens after things falls apart. Also stars Rebecca Hall. Based on the short story by Raymond Carver

programme.title: Daffodil
programme.desc: Jackie breaks several rules and regulations to help a 10-year-old girl caring for her lupus-stricken mother; Mrs. Akalitus accidentally tasers herself; O'Hara treats Zoey to a meal at a four-star restaurant

credits.director: Graphic Language, Adult Content, Brief Nudity

programme.title: Tiny Bubbles
programme.desc: A fellow nurse and old friend of Jackie's checks into the hospital with terminal lung cancer, and asks Jackie to help end her life; Dr. Cooper's mother is admitted with a gall bladder attack and reveals a family secret about her son's upbringing

programme.title: Steak Knife
programme.desc: A man is admitted to the ER with a steak knife in his chest, after an attack by the ex-husband of a woman he was dating for the first time; Mrs. Akalitus takes charge of a foundling abandoned at the nurses' station; O'Hara has a personal crisis

programme.title: Pupil
programme.desc: Jackie discovers that a new temp nurse is abusing drugs, but when she confronts him, he calls her on hypocrisy; Mrs. Akalitus still has the foundling infant left at the hospital; Coop reveals to Eddie that Jackie has a child(c)

programme.title: The Crying Game
programme.desc: In this dark thriller, a fugitive IRA soldier promises to protect the lover of the British soldier he was holding hostage, and when he seeks her out in London, they both have dangerous secrets they're unwilling to reveal. Stars Forest Whitaker

programme.title: Love The Coopers
programme.desc: In this all-star cast holiday movie, four generations of extended family gather for an annual Christmas Eve celebration and as the evening unfolds, a series of unexpected visitors and unlikely events turn the night upside down. Starring John Goodman, Diane Keaton, Marisa Tomei, Alan Arkin, Olivia Wilde and Ed Helms

programme.title: Jimmy Vestvood: Amerikan Hero
programme.desc: Satire about a bumbling Iranian immigrant who wins the green card lottery and moves to Los Angeles to pursue his dream of becoming an American hero and unwittingly becomes embroiled in a conspiracy to start the next world war
